## ListsService.getPublishableTargetTypes() method

Gets a list of Target Types for a specified Business Process Type. This operation returns an instance of 'TargetType' type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static getPublishableTargetTypes(escapedBusinessProcessTypeId: string): CancelablePromise<Array<TargetType>>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter                    | Type   | Description                                                                                                           |
| ---------------------------- | ------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| escapedBusinessProcessTypeId | string | The TCM URI of a Business Process Type with the colon escaped by replacing it with an underscore. E.g. "tcm_1-1-4096" |

**Returns:**

[CancelablePromise](./open-api-client.cancelablepromise.md)<!-- -->&lt;Array&lt;[TargetType](./open-api-client.targettype.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;

TargetType The request was successful.

## Exceptions

ApiError
